H0.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. United Kingdom

H1.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. Ireland

H2.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. Scotland

H3.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. H-Alba

A4.text: The Scottish Law Officers, (the Lord Advocate and Solicitor General) can be appointed from outside the Parliament's membership, but are subject to its approval.
